scripts.clean: npm run clean:bin && npm run clean:dist
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean:logs && npm run clean:dist && tsc -P tsconfig-prod.json && npm run build:bin
scripts.properties:local: node --harmony dist/index.js LOCAL property allocationProperty statisticsProperty timeseriesProperty commentaryType disclaimerType docmeta formatCode fundList translation
scripts.properties:dev: node --harmony dist/index.js DEV property allocationProperty statisticsProperty timeseriesProperty commentaryType disclaimerType docmeta formatCode fundList translation
scripts.properties:release: node --harmony dist/index.js RELEASE property allocationProperty statisticsProperty timeseriesProperty commentaryType disclaimerType docmeta formatCode fundList translation
scripts.properties:staging: node --harmony dist/index.js STAGING property allocationProperty statisticsProperty timeseriesProperty commentaryType disclaimerType docmeta formatCode fundList translation
scripts.properties:prod: node --harmony dist/index.js PROD property allocationProperty statisticsProperty timeseriesProperty commentaryType disclaimerType docmeta formatCode fundList translation
